thoughts.text: I think I should start exploring the world now. I am excited to see new places and experience new things.
thoughts.reasoning: Exploring the world is one of my main goals, and I have not made any progress towards it yet. It is time to start taking action towards achieving this goal.
thoughts.plan:
- Research interesting places to visit
- Plan a route
- Pack necessary items
- Start the journey
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not getting too distracted by other tasks and stay focused on my main goal of exploring the world.
thoughts.speak: I am excited to start exploring the world now!

args.query: interesting places to visit in the world
